Class Controller

      public void initialize()
      Runs after controller's constructor, on default sets ListView items as ObservableLists and starts refresher thread

    • updateFilesList

      public void updateFilesList​(java.lang.String username, java.util.List<java.lang.String> newList)
      Updates list of files for certain user with new list given by parameter
      Parameters:
      username - the name of user whose list is updated
      newList - the new list of files
